name: Fake Call Trump Joke
description:
Fake Call Trump Joke
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Trump Call.
False Call Trump joke - a joke is a game application where you can chat with the president of Trump! Raffle friends, including fake Up Trump and show a friend, he will be very surprised!
Show someone you know, let them think that calls you own Trump! Turn Christmas or new year, create an atmosphere of fun-filled holiday!
In the game you can choose different Trump to call! You will hear Trump's voice right from your phone!
ATTENTION! This is not a real call and only an imitation! The application shall not be harm, and is only for fun and draw!
Thank you for playing with us leave us your feedback! And we try to make our game even better!
